com.konakartadmin.blif

Interface AdminFilterMgrIf

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AdminFilterMgr, AdminFilterMgrEE

    public interface AdminFilterMgrIf
    AdminFiltertMgrIf

    • Method Detail

      • getFilters

        AdminFilterSearchResult getFilters(AdminFilterSearch search,
                                   AdminDataDescriptor dataDesc)
                            throws KKAdminException
        Returns an array of filter records matching the search criteria. If no records are found an empty array is returned.
        Parameters:
        search - an AdminFilterSearch object
        dataDesc - an AdminDataDescriptor object

        The returned filters may be sorted by:

        • AdminDataDescriptor.ORDER_BY_ORDER_ID_ASCENDING
        • AdminDataDescriptor.ORDER_BY_ORDER_ID_DESCENDING
        • AdminDataDescriptor.ORDER_BY_CUSTOMERS_ID_ASCENDING
        • AdminDataDescriptor.ORDER_BY_CUSTOMERS_ID_ASCENDING
        • AdminDataDescriptor.ORDER_BY_TABLE_ASCENDING
        • AdminDataDescriptor.ORDER_BY_TABLE_DESCENDING
        • AdminDataDescriptor.ORDER_BY_COLUMN_ASCENDING
        • AdminDataDescriptor.ORDER_BY_COLUMN_DESCENDING
        • AdminDataDescriptor.ORDER_BY_CONSTRAINT_ASCENDING
        • AdminDataDescriptor.ORDER_BY_CONSTRAINT_DESCENDING
        • AdminDataDescriptor.ORDER_BY_CUSTOM1_ASCENDING
        • AdminDataDescriptor.ORDER_BY_CUSTOM1_DESCENDING
        • AdminDataDescriptor.ORDER_BY_CUSTOM2_ASCENDING
        • AdminDataDescriptor.ORDER_BY_CUSTOM3_DESCENDING
        Returns:
        Returns an AdminFilterSearchResult object containing an array of filter records matching the search criteria. If there are no records an empty array is returned within the AdminFilterSearchResult.
        Throws:
        KKAdminException - an unexpected exception in the KonaKart Admin engine

      • getFiltersForCustomer

        AdminFilter[] getFiltersForCustomer(int custId)
                             throws KKAdminException
        Returns an array of filter records matching the search criteria. If no records are found an empty array is returned.
        Parameters:
        custId - an AdminFilterSearch object
        Returns:
        Returns the filters belonging to the specified customer. If there are no records an empty array is returned.
        Throws:
        KKAdminException - an unexpected exception in the KonaKart Admin engine

      • getFilter

        AdminFilter getFilter(int Id)
               throws KKAdminException
        Returns the filter referenced by the Id.
        Parameters:
        Id - the id of the Filter
        Returns:
        Returns an AdminFilter object if it exists, otherwise it returns null
        Throws:
        KKAdminException - an unexpected exception in the KonaKart Admin engine

      • insertFilter

        int insertFilter(AdminFilter filter)
          throws KKAdminException
        Insert an AdminFilter record.
        Parameters:
        filter - the AdminFilter record to insert
        Returns:
        the Id of the inserted AdminFilter
        Throws:
        KKAdminException - an unexpected exception in the KonaKart Admin engine

      • updateFilter

        void updateFilter(AdminFilter filter)
           throws KKAdminException
        Update an AdminFilterType object
        Parameters:
        filter - an AdminFilter object
        Throws:
        KKAdminException - an unexpected exception in the KonaKart Admin engine

      • deleteFilter

        void deleteFilter(int id)
           throws KKAdminException
        Delete an AdminFilter object
        Parameters:
        id - the Id of the AdminFilter record to delete
        Throws:
        KKAdminException - an unexpected exception in the KonaKart Admin engine

      • deleteFiltersForCustomer

        void deleteFiltersForCustomer(int userId)
                       throws KKAdminException
        Delete all the AdminFilter objects associated with the specified customer
        Parameters:
        userId - the userId of the customer whose AdminFilter records to delete
        Throws:
        KKAdminException - an unexpected exception in the KonaKart Admin engine

      • filterMgrPresent

        boolean filterMgrPresent()
        Returns true if the filter manager is present. Only the EE version will return true.
        Returns:
        true if the filter manager is present otherwise false

      • refreshConfigs

        void refreshConfigs()
             throws java.lang.Exception
        Refresh the configuration of the AdminFiltertMgr
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - an unexpected exception
